name: Peng-Shuai Wang
content: Peng-Shuai Wang Peng-Shuai Wang （王鹏帅） Assistant Professor, Ph.D. Advisor Wangxuan Institute of Computer Technology Peking University Address: Haidian District, Beijing, China Email: wangps AT hotmail.com GitHub Google Twitter Blog I am a tenure-track Assistant Professor at Peking University from 2022. I am now working closely with top graphics labs at Peking University led by Prof. Baoquan Chen, Prof. Zhouhui Lian, and Prof. Guoping	Wang. Before joining Peking University, I was a senior researcher in the graphics group at Microsoft Research Asia led by Dr. Xin Tong, where I was also a research intern from 2014 to 2018, mentored by Dr. Yang Liu. I received my Ph.D. from the Institute for Advanced Study at Tsinghua University in 2018, supervised by Prof. Baining Guo. I got my Bachelor's degree from the Department of Automation at Tsinghua University in 2013. I am leading the Spatial Intelligence Group (SIG) at Peking University. My research interests include computer graphics, geometry processing, and deep learning. My recent research focus is to develop a unified 3D deep learning framework for the understanding, generation, and rendering of 3D data. My paper on Octree-based 3D Convolutional Neural Networks is one of the Top-5 Most Cited Papers in ACM Transactions on Graphics from 2017 to 2022. I have been awarded the AsiaGraphics Young Researcher Award in 2023, and China3DV Excellent Young Researcher Award in 2025. I am always actively recruiting Ph.D. students and research interns! Welcome to contact me with your CV and research statement! Aug. 13, 2025, I have 1 paper accepted by SIGGRAPH Asia 2025. May. 27, 2025, I start to serve as the associate editor for IEEE TVCG. May. 17, 2025, I have 1 paper accepted by SGP 2025. Apr. 13, 2025, I am awarded the China3DV 2025 Excellent Young Researcher Award. Mar. 29, 2025: I have 2 papers accepted by SIGGRAPH 2025. Mar. 06, 2025, I will serve as a technical papers committee member for SIGGRAPH Asia 2025. Aug. 01, 2024: I have 1 paper accepted by SIGGRAPH Asia 2024. Apr. 24, 2024: Our paper SDF-StyleGAN is awarded one of the Top-10 Most Cited Papers in CGF from 2022 to 2023. Oct. 15, 2023: I am awarded the AsiaGraphics Young Researcher Award. Aug. 04, 2023: I have 5 papers accepted by SIGGRAPH (Asia) 2023, including one single-author paper.
